article_title: Obamacare's Medicaid Expansion Boosts Anthem With 2015 Profits Ahead

article_metadata.description: Buoyed by growth from the expansion of the Medicaid business under the Affordable Care Act, health insurance giant Anthem (ANTM) said fourth-quarter profits rose and its executives predicted enrollment gains across all insurance lines in 2015. Anthem, which operates Blue Cross plans in 14 states, said it had 37.5 million medical [...]
article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen
